sentences.sContent: When you have your simplified core concept ready, then build that core concept very quickly and cheaply.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you have your simplified core concept ready, then build that core concept very quickly and cheaply.
sentences.sCn: 如果你已经将核心概念简化，那么非常快速并且廉价地构建这一概念。

words.tran: 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的
